search_03_003/4301_1001_0100_10:
Phew... Looks like we cleared out all the
Team Break stragglers in this area.
search_03_003/4301_1001_0200_10:
Hmm... Think we did good enough to squeeze
a compliment out of Master Lear for once?
search_03_003/4301_1001_0300_10:
Rachel...the young master highly values
the work that you do. You know that.
search_03_003/4301_1001_0400_10:
I knowww, but he never says it to my face...
I’m just saying, a li’l compliment here and there
would be nice.
search_03_003/4301_1001_0500_10:
Well, he’s got a lot on his shoulders for someone
so young. Running the PML is no small feat.
search_03_003/4301_1001_0600_10:
Yeahhh, Master Lear does seem pretty passionate
about it. He says he’s gonna create a whole
new way to battle, starting here on Pasio.
search_03_003/4301_1001_0700_10:
That’s right. Right now, what the young master
wants most is to see his tournament go off
without a hitch.
search_03_003/4301_1001_0800_10:
That’s why we’re out here keeping order.
We can’t afford to let Team Break ruin
Pasio’s reputation.
search_03_003/4301_1001_0900_10:
Yeahhh. We do it because we love him,
huh, Sawyer.
search_03_003/4301_1001_1000_10:
L-love the—! The young master is someone
I respect. He’s my prince!
search_03_003/4301_1001_1100_10:
Saaame thing.... Anyways, thanks a bunch for
helping us out, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_03_003/4301_1001_1300_10:
However...the young master IS going to
win the PML. Both of us support him
wholeheartedly in that, all right?
search_03_003/4301_1001_1400_10:
Well, maaaybe we could root for you a
li’l bit, too. Juuust a li’l bit.
